thread.title: ‘Joe, there’s no room for you’: Texts from Malcolm
thread.title_full: ‘Joe, there’s no room for you’: Texts from Malcolm

title: ‘Joe, there’s no room for you’: Texts from Malcolm
text:
Email a friend 
AUSTRALIA’S new Prime Minister is a communicative chap, so it’s fitting that there’s a LOL-tastic Instagram account dedicated to the witty put-downs and sharp comebacks he’s probably texting during Question Time. 
With reports emerging from Buzzfeed that Tony Abbott sent his resignation to the governor-general using a fax machine , the parody account underlines just how different our smartphone-obsessed new leader is from the former PM. 
The split-screen posts on the brilliant @textsfrommalcolm imagine what Mr Turnbull might be saying as he taps away on his mobile in Parliament. 
It all seems highly believable. We see him providing tech advice to fellow ministers, asking George Clooney to play him in the “inevitable biopic” and arranging a boys’ weekend with Prince Harry. 
The prescient first photo, shared six months ago, shows Tony Abbott writing a text with the caption, “Can we chat?” and the new PM replying: “Don’t have this number.” 
It’s the parody account that’s made for our tech-savvy leader, “Because Tony Abbott doesn’t have opposable thumbs.” A photo posted by Malcolm Turnbull (@textsfrommalcolm) on Sep 14, 2015 at 4:49am PDT A photo posted by Malcolm Turnbull (@textsfrommalcolm) on Mar 12, 2015 at 8:37pm PDT A photo posted by Malcolm Turnbull (@textsfrommalcolm) on Sep 14, 2015 at 6:15pm PDT A photo posted by Malcolm Turnbull (@textsfrommalcolm) on Mar 9, 2015 at 7:42pm PDT A photo posted by Malcolm Turnbull (@textsfrommalcolm) on Mar 7, 2015 at 10:40pm PST A photo posted by Malcolm Turnbull (@textsfrommalcolm) on Aug 3, 2015 at 2:16pm PDT A photo posted by Malcolm Turnbull (@textsfrommalcolm) on Mar 7, 2015 at 11:16pm PST A photo posted by Malcolm Turnbull (@textsfrommalcolm) on Mar 8, 2015 at 3:37am PDT A photo posted by Malcolm Turnbull (@textsfrommalcolm) on Mar 8, 2015 at 3:35am PDT A photo posted by Malcolm Turnbull (@textsfrommalcolm) on Mar 8, 2015 at 3:47am PDT A photo posted by Malcolm Turnbull (@textsfrommalcolm) on Jul 24, 2015 at 11:42pm PDT A photo posted by Malcolm Turnbull (@textsfrommalcolm) on Mar 24, 2015 at 3:11pm PDT A photo posted by Malcolm Turnbull (@textsfrommalcolm) on Sep 15, 2015 at 2:58am PDT
